title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set
OB: When attempting to open the group dialog, an error message is shown instead
EB: The group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether the dataset is set or not
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the group section
3. Click on the 'Add Group' button
4. Verify that the group dialog is displayed regardless of the dataset being set
